resume.name: SUZANNE HONEYCUTT

responsibilities: Perform quarterly loss reserve analysis for commercial property and casualty lines using chain-ladder and Bornhuetter-Ferguson methods.
Maintain and update pricing models in R to reflect recent loss trends and changes in legislative environments.
Collaborate with the data science team to integrate predictive modeling into the underwriting process for personal lines.
Prepare and document state rate filings to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements.
Automated the monthly valuation reporting process using SQL and R, reducing manual processing time by 15 hours per month.
Assisted senior actuaries in sensitivity testing for universal life products to evaluate financial impact under various interest rate scenarios.
Performed data reconciliation tasks to ensure the integrity of policyholder data used in mortality studies.

skills: Proficient in R, SQL, and Python
